content.question: Which of the following is an example of the schedule of reinforcement that has the slowest response rate as depicted in the graph?

choices.label: A person receives a free cup of coffee after purchasing 10 cups of coffee from the local coffee shop.
A local fast-food restaurant tells customers they are going to release a coupon for a free meal on their app at some point during the day.
Someone wins a prize in a lottery drawing.
Every Tuesday, the local movie theater offers free popcorn and a drink with a purchase of a movie ticket.

content.answer: A local fast-food restaurant tells customers they are going to release a coupon for a free meal on their app at some point during the day.

skill.text: 3.A: Identify psychology-related concepts in descriptions or representations of data.
